trans-unit.source: Represents the XSLT transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la trasformazione XSLT per una firma digitale, come definito per la W3C.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class allows you to address an XML document using an XSLT transformation.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>classe consente di inviare un documento XML utilizzando una trasformazione XSLT.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: This class uses XSLT to transform XML nodes into other XML nodes that you want to sign or encrypt.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe utilizza XSLT per trasformare i nodi XML in altri nodi XML che si desidera firmare o crittografare.

trans-unit.source: Use the XmlDsigXsltTransform class to sign or encrypt specific parts of an XML document using an XSLT transformation.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la classe XmlDsigXsltTransform per firmare o crittografare parti specifiche di un documento XML utilizzando una trasformazione XSLT.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the XmlDsigXsltTransform class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXsltTransformUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: La risorsa identificatore URI (Uniform) che descrive la classe XmlDsigXsltTransform Ã¨ definito per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXsltTransformUrl>campo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXsltTransformUrl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the XSLT transform, see Section 6.6.5 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla trasformazione XSLT, vedere la sezione 6.6.5 della specifica XMLDSIG, disponibile tramite il W3C in www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> class with comments, if specified.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> classe con commenti, se specificato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include comments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per includere commenti. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una rappresentazione XML dei parametri del <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetti che possono essere inclusi come sottoelementi di un XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object in an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco dei nodi XML che rappresentano il contenuto specifico della trasformazione necessario per descrivere corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto in un XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'output dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo dell'oggetto restituito deve essere <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: L'output dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object of type <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'output dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto di tipo <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo dell'oggetto restituito deve essere <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di output da restituire.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream> is the only valid type for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>Ã¨ l'unico tipo valido per questo parametro.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object of type <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: L'output dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto di tipo <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is not a object.
trans-unit.target: Il type parametro non Ã¨ un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una matrice di tipi di input valido per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*>metodo dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Tipi di input validi per <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>sono <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>e <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice di tipi di input validi per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto; Ã¨ possibile passare solo oggetti di uno di questi tipi per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*>metodo dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object as transform-specific content of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element and configures the internal state of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object to match the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Consente di analizzare specificato <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref> oggetto come contenuto specifico della trasformazione di un <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""> </xref> elemento e configura lo stato interno dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto in modo che corrisponda il <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to process subelements of a `<Transform>` element.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per l'elaborazione dei sottoelementi un `<Transform>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object that encapsulates an XSLT style sheet to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref> oggetto che incapsula un foglio di stile XSLT per caricare in corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This style sheet is applied to the document loaded by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo foglio di stile viene applicato al documento caricato per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*>metodo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: The nodeList parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The nodeList parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The nodeList parameter does not contain an object.
trans-unit.target: - o - nodeList parametro non contiene un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified input into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Carica l'input specificato in corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo dell'oggetto di input deve essere uno dei tipi di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.InputTypes%2A>proprietÃ .</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.InputTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Tipi di input validi per <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>sono <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>e <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Input da caricare in corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una matrice di tipi che sono possibili output il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput*>metodi dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream> is the only valid output type for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>Ã¨ il tipo di output valido solo per <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform></xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice di tipi di output valido per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto; solo gli oggetti di uno di questi tipi vengono restituiti dal <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput*>metodi dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput*>
